title: Mantou buns

ingredients.content: 30 g oil, plus extra for greasing
400 g plain flour, plus extra for dusting

preparations.content: Lightly grease Varoma dish and tray with oil, then set aside.
Place milk, sugar, yeast, baking powder and oil into mixing bowl and mix <b>30 sec/37°C/speed 2<b>.

Add flour and salt and knead <b>2 min/<b>. Transfer dough onto a silicone bread mat or lightly floured work surface and roll out into a rectangle (approx. 30 x 20 cm). Starting from longest edge, roll dough into a log shape and cut into 12 equal portions.
Divide dough portions between prepared Varoma dish and Varoma tray. Cover with Varoma lid and leave dough in a warm place until doubled in size (approx. 1 hour).
Carefully place boiling water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10-15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> or until buns are cooked through. Serve buns warm (see Tip).

hintsAndTricks: Mantou buns can be served as an accompaniment to both savoury and sweet dishes.
